title: Darius Bug (Dunkmaster Skin)
body:
So i was playing Darius after i bought the dunkmaster skin and i noticed that Darius struggles to target minions and champions at certain parts of the game. Apparently this is related to Darius's W but it happens even with it not activated. 

So what im trying to say is "rito pls fix" otherwise i would appreciate a refund because i can not play up to standard with htis skin equipped.

replies.body: There used to be a bug with Champions with empowered auto-attacks (Shyvana's Q for example) where it would chase them, get in attack range then fail to auto-attack and wobble on the spot a bit then continue chasing and continue doing this. Was really annoying. Maybe it's related (they fixed it, not sure if anything was said about it but I think it was a pathing problem and it's probably worth sending in a report ticket about as this usually gets Riot's attention guaranteed and then they could fix it).
How does he have trouble targeting minions?
